author: Brent D. Griffiths
title: McConnell said Trump is 'always setting up somebody to blame it on' ahead of Georgia's pivotal 2021 Senate runoffs

sentence: Georgia has a been a traditionally red state, but the wins by Warnock, Sen. John Ossoff, and the potential for Stacey Abrams to beat Republican governor Brian Kemp could show Democrats have been making progress.

title: Potential Warnock vs. Walker Georgia Senate Battle Shows It Could Be A Close Race

title: Democrats look to defy political headwinds in Georgia
